author: ltheussl
msg: Remove plugin-plugin dependency for m1.0.2 compatibility.
Keep a warning about the artifact-plugin 1.3 in the documentation,
but, being rather old, this is not checked for in plugin.jelly.

author: dlestrat
msg: Add link to AJAX API guide.

author: vajda
msg: made build.xml accept db.version property argument

author: mvdb
msg: - It doesn't support BIGINT yet, so using LONG instead. (in axion cvs BIGINT is supported). Also reflected this in the docs
- Axion doesn't seem to be able to use quotes around fields and tables.
- When comments are on, axion chokes, so by default it is turned of now
- Updated the TestAxionPlatform to reflect the changes in quoting
